title: 打开mc就崩溃，1.7到1.12所有版本都崩溃，求解
author: lpshhh
txt_content:

replies.author: Gingerbread
replies.txt_content:
java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: com/mojang/util/QueueLogAppender : Unsupported major.minor version 52.0复制代码
Java版本出错，尝试重新安装Java。

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2018-11-22 01:18 编辑 

尝试重新下载安装Java8解决问题
https://www.oracle.com/technetwo ... nloads-2133155.html先接受协议，然后下载windows64位java8，后缀exe的

replies.author: lpshhh
